text: I figured out how to handle swipe up/down gestures to switch between Capture and Timeline in both the Press and Tap flavors, so I uploaded both APKs to BaseCamp
are you out for the day? mind if we chat through that estimate first?

The transition from Capture to Timeline is slower than going from Timeline to Capture, and that is because we have to release the camera, which takes a little bit of time. Tomorrow I hope to have time to do some performance tuning and improve that, but performance tuning is pretty difficult, so I may prioritize animation choreography if I get stuck somewhere.
I'm heading out soonish, but I have time to chat through plans
